name: Ice Cream Truck!
summary:
Ice Cream Truck!

A fun and cute interactive app for Kids! 

Ride along on an Ice Cream Truck as it drives through neighborhoods to bring ice cream and ice pops to kids. Serve kids ice pops and make ice cream cones or ice cream sundaes! Try to remember which kid wants which treat! See if you can follow the ice cream order diagram to make it just right! Then go to the ice cream factory to sort ice pops by matching their colors! 

A real treat for those little Ice Cream Truck enthusiasts and a great way to encourage curiosity and interaction for all. Touch the driver to honk the horn. Touch the speakers on top of the truck and to play a song. Touch a cloud as it passes by and it smiles and hums. The neighborhood is interactive. When your child touches people, animals, or objects they make sounds and perform actions. Its like a moving story book! 

A great way to explore the sights and sounds of an Ice Cream Truck!


*Compatible with: iPod Touch 3 & 4 generation, iPhone 3GS, iPhone 4, iPhone 5 & all iPads 

----------------------------------------------- 

*Note: NOT Compatible with: First generation iPhone, iPhone 3G, and iPod Touch 1st & 2nd generation. 

-----------------------------------------------
